channel.title: CRIB Configuration :: CRIB artemis
channel.description: Artemis configuration varies from experiment to experiment. We would like to explain in this chapter how they are configured and used in CRIB experiment.

item.title: Analysis environment
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa CRIB shares the analysis environment of all experiments under one user account (username crib). Therefore, when you want to check data from an old experiment or when several people are analysing the data, you need to log in to the same user account.

item.title: Online-mode analysis
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa We often use “nssta” (non-save mode start) analysis in the beam tuning. It is not necessary to take data, but we need to check the beam condition by using artemis. In this case, TRIDFEventStore can be used as online mode.

item.title: User config
item.description: last modified: 2024-01-20 by Kodai Okawa Warning still under consideration in this part!

item.title: New commands
item.description: last modified: 2024-01-20 by Kodai Okawa Various commands (mainly the same with ANAPAW commands) have been developed for CRIB experiment. For more information, please click here (src-crib/commands). These commands are registered in userlogon.C. (See previous section.)

item.title: Minor changes
item.description: last modified: 2024-01-11 by Kodai Okawa thisartemis.sh.in Grammar issue I think.
